column4: So, this is a channel #ubuntu.... I am wondering about other lists... how does this irc work. There can't be only one server to which you can connections for ALL such channels.
there's tons of servers, xchat comes w/ a big list of a few

and all these servers host these channels. No, it can't be. so it is like xchat has information which server is hosting what channel, and creates a connection depending upon the channel one chooses? am i making sense here?
xchat connects to a server which hosts whatever channels it hosts
